metadata.description: An adventure of one of comics' original super-heroines! Plus an extra-special classic reprint of one of her original 1940's adventures. Jen van Meter and Andy MacDonald take you back to a time when the fate of the United States rested not only in thousands of men fighting for freedom overseas, but also in the hands of the women back home building the equipment that would keep the country running and winning! So get ready Axis Annie, Vichy Vixen, and...Madame Mauzer! Her name might be Miss America...but she sure ain't gonna miss a chance to sock evil in the face!
metadata.name: Miss America Comics 70th Anniversary Special
